thread.title: Sania Mirza's special biryani treat for SRK and the 'Dilwale' team
thread.title_full: Sania Mirza's special biryani treat for SRK and the 'Dilwale' team - Sports

author: Agencies
title: Sania Mirza's special biryani treat for SRK and the 'Dilwale' team
text:
Superstar Shah Rukh Khan and the whole cast of his forthcoming film "Dilwale" were "served" a sumptous meal of biryani by tennis star Sania Mirza in Hyderabad.


Kajol, SRK, Farah Khan, Sania Mirza and Varun Dhawan. Pic Courtesy/ Sania Mirza's official Instagram account 
SRK took to Twitter to thank Sania for the biryani and also complimented the tennis champion.
"@MirzaSania your returns are impeccable but the Biryani you 'serve' is untouchable. Your smile won over the whole set. Thanks," Shah Rukh tweeted on Monday.
The "Chennai Express" actor also posted a picture of himself with Sania, Kajol, director-choreographer friend Farah Khan, Varun and actor Varun Sharma.
"@MirzaSania your returns are impeccable but the Biryani you 'serve' is untouchable. Your smile won over the whole set.
Thanks," tweeted the "Chennai Express" star. "Awee... Anytime for you all.. Glad you finally got sometime to eat some biryani after that all nighter.. See u soon," Sania replied to Shah Rukh.
In an earlier tweet, the 28-year-old sportsperson thanked the "Dilwale" cast for making her laugh.
"Wonderful 'Dilwale' hosted me on set in my own city. Thank you for all the laughs @Varun_dvn @iamsrk@TheFarahKhan."
Thanking her for the biryani, Varun wrote, "Thank you for the biryani and now u enjoy my city," to which Sani replied, "Yes yes... And thank you for the green tea. Don't know what I would have done without it..."
Rohit Shetty-directed "Dilwale", which also stars Kriti Sanon is slated to hit the screens on December 18 this year.
Kajol and SRK will be seen on the silver screen for the first time since Karan Johar's "My Name Is Khan" in 2010.
